paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

paragraphs.content: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

paragraphs.content: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.

paragraphs.content: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.

paragraphs.content: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.

paragraphs.content: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let every thing that hath breath praise the Lord. Praise ye the Lord.
